content: decrease round 13 k2tog yo k3 yo cdd yo k3 yo ssk x5 - 65 sts k knit round 15 ssk yo k3 cdd k3 yo k2tog x5 - 55 sts k2tog knit two stitches together round 17 ssk yo k2 cdd k2 yo k2tog x5 - 45 sts k3tog knit three stitches together round 19 ssk yo k1 cdd k1 yo k2tog x5 - 35 sts ssk slip slip knit round 21 ssk cdd k2tog x5 - 15 sts sssk slip slip slip knit round 23 cdd x5 - 5 sts sts stitches yo yarn over cut the working yarn thread through remaining sts and pull tight to close the hole weave in ends and block chart 23 the chart is read from right to left bottom to top the red frame shows the 21 pattern repeat which will be repeated 5 times per round only odd rounds have 19 been charted all the even rounds are knit all sts 17 stitch key 15 13 k yo 11 no stitch cdd 9 7 k2tog k3tog 5 ssk sssk 3 1 pattern repeat 23 21 19 17 15 13 11 9 7 5 3 1 this pattern is intended for personal use only any copying distribution or publication is not allowed ©arina2022
